Name: Abe Stark Rink
Location: Coney Island Boardwalk and West 19th Street
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: The rink will open for Thanksgiving Weekend from November 24 – 26, 2017 from noon to 4:00 p.m. The rink is closed on Christmas Day and Christmas Eve; however, the rink will open during the holidays from December 26, 2017 – January 1, 2018 from noon to 4:00 p.m. The rink is open on both January 15 (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) and February 19 (Presidents Day) from noon to 4:00 p.m.
Notes: Open weekends only. All information subject to change; please call ahead for details.  All skaters must sign a Risk of Ice Skating/Hockey Activity Agreement. Persons under 18 years of age must have written consent form signed by parent or guardian. Agreement forms available at rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or parent's signature must be notarized.

Name: LeFrak Center at Lakeside
Location: Enter at Lincoln Road and Ocean Avenue.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Adult: $6; $9 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Child: $6; $9 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Notes: The facility, including rinks, snack bar and Bluestone Café, may be utilized at other times for special events, private functions, classes or programmed activities, and/or rink rentals.

Name: The Rink at Bryant Park
Skate_Rental_Cost: $20. The Rink at Bryant Park provides skate aids for $22/hour.
Locker_Information:
Lockers are free, but locks cost $10.
Bag check is $12.00. ($15.00 for large bags)

Name: Lasker Rink
Location: Entrance just south of park entrance at 110th Street & Lenox Avenue.
Locker_Information:
$4.00 + $4.00 refundable deposit for lock rentals
(Deposit will be returned to the customer upon return of the lock.)
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: New Year's Eve: 10:00 a.m to 6:00 p.m.; New Year's Day: 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.
Programming: Adult hockey, youth hockey, open hockey, hockey classes, Learn to Skate, Learn to Skate Holiday Camp, private & semi-private lessons, birthday parties. Adult Open Hockey every Saturday night from 9:15 pm - 10:45 p.m.; $15 admission, free for goalies.
Notes: Cash only. Check laskerrink.com for more information6

Name: Wollman Rink
Locker_Information:
$5.00 + $6.00 deposit
(Deposit will be returned to the customer after lock is returned.)
Notes:
Please note: The rink will open from 10:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. on October 21 and October 22.

Cash only. Spectator Fee: $5.00.

Name: WWII Veterans War Memorial Ice Skating Rink
Location: Victory Blvd., west of Clove Rd.
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: The Election Day from noon to 4:00 p.m., November 24 (day after Thanksgiving Day) from noon to 11:00 p.m., Christmas Eve from noon to 4:00 p.m., closed on Christmas Day, noon to 4:30 p.m. and 7:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. from December 16 – 30, New Year’s Eve and New Year’s Day from noon to 4:00 p.m., Martin Luther King Jr. Day (January 15) from noon to 4:00 p.m., Presidents Day (February 19) from noon to 4:00 p.m., noon to 4:00 p.m. during mid-winter recess (February 20 – 22), and noon to 11:00 p.m. on February 23.
Notes: Please call (718) 720-1010 before heading to the rink. For skating school information, please call (718) 390-7245. Persons under 18 years of age must have written consent form signed by parent or guardian. Agreement forms available at rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or parent's signature must be notarized.

Name: World Ice Arena
Skate_Rental_Cost: $6.00/person. You must wear socks to rent skates.
Locker_Information: Coin-operated lockers are available for rent ($0.75 per use).
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: For holiday public skating hours, please visit worldice.com for more information.
Programming: Please see the World Ice Arena website for details on Learn to Skate, hockey, and freestyle skate programming.
Notes: World Ice Arena is a year-round ice skating rink. The facility is Sled Hockey Accessible.
